title: Arnold Palmer Invitational: Viktor Hovland leads Rory McIlory by two strokes

sentence: It was a day for the streetfighters, therefore, so no surprise to see Graeme McDowell shoot 69 to move up 23 places to stand alongside McIlroy, while Matt Fitzpatrick shot 70 to be inside the top ten.
author: Derek Lawrenson Golf Correspondent At Bay Hill
title: DEREK LAWRENSON AT BAY HILL: It has been the year of the underdog at the PGA Tour this season with Talor Gooch and Billy Horschel leading the way, and Rory McIlroy, Viktor Hovland and Brit Tyrrell Hatton struggling to deliver

sentence: In a repeat of last yearâ€™s final, Horschel will face Scottie Scheffler in the last 16 after the latter twice got the better of Matt Fitzpatrick, firstly winning their group five contest 5 and 4 to force a play-off and then making a birdie on the sixth extra hole to advance.
author: Phil Casey
title: Seamus Power books Masters debut despite defeat in final group game in Austin

sentence: He closed on one over with a 73 for a tie of 12th, while Lee Westwood and Matt Fitzpatrick climbed to two over with respective sub-par rounds of one and two under.
author: Riath Al-Samarrai for the Daily Mail
title: Tyrrell Hatton admits 'I'm just glad it's all over' as the English hothead can't hide his anger after finishing SEVENTEEN over par at the Masters
